front.title: LDP Extensions for Optimized MAC Address Withdrawal in H-VPLS

abstract.t: [RFC4762] describes a mechanism to remove or unlearn MAC addresses that have been dynamically learned in a VPLS Instance for faster convergence on topology change. The procedure also removes MAC addresses in the VPLS that do not require relearning due to such topology change. This document defines an enhancement to the MAC Address Withdrawal procedure with empty MAC List [RFC4762], which enables a Provider Edge(PE) device to remove only the MAC addresses that need to be relearned. Additional extensions to [RFC4762] MAC Withdrawal procedures are specified to provide optimized MAC flushing for the PBB-VPLS specified in [PBB-VPLS Model].
